sentences.en: Do red hobnail and hobnail of prop drawing form have without distinction?
sentences.cn: 条彤鞋钉和回柱形鞋钉有无区别?

sentences.en: His hobnail boots clattered on the stone floor.
sentences.cn: 他那双钉了铁掌的靴子在石地板上嗒嗒响。

sentences.en: Strut of cell of tube wall endodermis, appear hobnail kind dash forward to tubal antrum.
sentences.cn: 管壁内皮细胞肿胀, 似鞋钉样突向管腔.

sentences.en: The epithelial elements were variable in cell types including cuboidal, hobnail and columnar cells.
sentences.cn: 上皮细胞可呈立方状、柱状 、 鞋钉样.

words.tran_cn: 鞋钉，[五金]平头钉；乡下佬

trans.tran_cn: （钉在笨重的鞋底部的）平头钉，大头钉
trans.tran_en: a short nail with a large head for protecting the soles of heavy footwear
